name: 蔡銘修
objective: 認識英文學術論文的語法、文體、結構組織等特質，並探討英文報告及論文撰寫方式。
schedule:
01 02/21 Intro(research topic)
02 02/28 Peace Memorial Day(no class)
03 03/07 Endnote and Turnitin (bring your own laptop)
04 03/14 Writing Summaries
05 03/21 Research- Introduction (submit research topic)
06 03/28 Research- Literature Review
07 04/04 Spring Break(no class) 
08 04/11 Research- Method, Result and Discussion
09 04/18 Midterm Week (turn in Mid Term Report)
10 04/25 Research Conclusion and Suggest
11 05/02 Mid Term Report Review
12 05/09 Research Papers Critique-1
13 05/16 Research Papers Critique-2
14 05/23 Research Papers Critique-3
15 05/30 Research Papers Critique-4
16 06/06 Final Presentation-1
17 06/13 Final Presentation-2
18 06/20 Final Exam Week (final paper due)
scorePolicy:
Grading:
1. Attendance 15%
2. Mid Term Report 20% 
    - Topic, Introduction and Literature Review
    - 12 font, 1.5 spaces
    - suggest more than 3 pages
3. Research Papers Critique 15%
4. Final Presentation 20%
5. Final Research Paper 30% 
    - 12 font, 1.5 spaces
    - suggest full paper (7 pages)
6. Additional grade 5% (papers are accepted in International journal or conference)
materials:
Academic Writing for Graduate Students 3/e
Author: John M. Swales, & Christine B. Feak
Publisher: Michigan Press
Publication date: 2013/3
ISBN: 9780472034758
